title: Ratify child series LLC, 'LexDAO LLC, Resolver Series'
body:
LexDAO LLC (#7847101) is a 'master' series LLC formed in Delaware for the purposes of for-profit, public-facing services and products associated with the LexDAO cooperative, a WY unincorporated non-profit association. Its membership consists of legal engineers who hold the LEETH NFT (0x7106bb3faaa84fff35ed57405d24d47dea6df183) and are members of LexDAO cooperative.

Under its umbrella, LexDAO LLC might ratify the formation of a child 'series' with its own separate liabilities and assets devoted to on-chain subjective resolution services, such as arbitration and certifications of contracts and accounts.

Currently, the following multi-sigs are deployed that consist of LexDAO legal engineers who can also vote on this proposal:

Ethereum mainnet: 0x5B620676E28693fC14876b035b08CbB1B657dF38
Arbitrum: 0x2f3F50ACc51b240cFf2a452Af050Cc601d3Adccf
xDai: 0x153Fbf5da827903e030Dc317C4031755D74D508a
Polygon: 0xf8DBd458f841424e2fD5fBDf18A7dEA17eb2211D

These multi-sigs are currently secured by 2/5 signatures with plans to upgrade to 3/5 after a trial period.
author: 0x1C0Aa8cCD568d90d61659F060D1bFb1e6f855A20
